name: canva_bulk_search
description: Search multiple template types on Canva in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling canva_search_templates multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/templates/"], [class*="template"] a, [class*="card"] a'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="title"], h3, [aria-label]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const proEl = el.querySelector('[class*="pro"], [class*="premium"]'); results.push({ title: nameEl ? (nameEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || nameEl.textContent.trim()) : (el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''), is_premium: !!proEl, image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: el.href || '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
